attributes.action: Reduce the pay of MP's in line with the power they have given away to Brussles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our MP's and governments have given away the British people's power to govern ourselves for decades with no consequence. They must all be aware that their office holds no power any longer so their pursuit of office must be purely for money. Their should be a consequence for giving away our power.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
